text: John Gibb Marshall (11 January 1953 â€“ 2 November 2020), better known by the stage name John Sessions, was a British actor and comedian. He was known for comedy television shows such as Whose Line Is It Anyway?. He was a panellist on QI. Sessions died of a heart attack at his South London home on 2 November 2020, aged 67. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:British television presenters Category:Comedians from London Category:Television personalities from London
